definition: to act arbitrarily regardless of the rules/to mess with sth/to make a hash of things/to cause trouble
surname Hu
non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
beard/mustache/whiskers
see 衚衕|胡同[hu2 tong4]
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: Judge Stephens allowed no foolishness when he held court.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂芬斯法官开庭时不允许人胡来。

sentences.english: I'll protect my fame here, no one dares to mess up with me.
sentences.chinese: 我会维护自己的面子，没人敢跟我胡来的。

sentences.english: How can bear to see love is difficult and emotional unforgivable love to mess things up.
sentences.chinese: 可怎么忍心看爱有为难，情感也不能饶恕爱胡来。

sentences.english: Marshall stopped fooling around with other girls when he met Jessica.
sentences.chinese: 自从遇见杰西卡，马歇尔就不再与其他女孩胡来了。

sentences.english: If the correct way to do it is the wrong way, then I yield.
sentences.chinese: 如果胡来才是准确的方法的话，那我闭嘴。

sentences.english: Old summer for everyone in the hall after the meeting and tell them not to fool around.
sentences.chinese: 老夏在大厅里给大家开会并告诉他们以后不要胡来。

sentences.english: If you don't know how to do it， don't fool with it.
sentences.chinese: 你要是不会干就别胡来。

sentences.english: I also take money away if he acts out.
sentences.chinese: 如果他胡来，我也会把钱拿走。

definition: to act recklessly/to mess around
to act willfully and make a scene/to make trouble
to run amok (idiom); to commit outrages
to mess around/to mess with something/to have an affair
lit. not knowing what's important (idiom); no appreciation of the gravity of things/naive/doesn't know who's who/no sense of priorities
to forgive easily/to let off lightly (often with negative: you won't get away with it)
to use violence (against sb)/to strong-arm sb/to manhandle
to take rash action
regardless of the law and of natural morality (idiom); maverick/undisciplined and out of control
to talk rubbish
to make a scene/to fool around/to behave foolishly
(literary) hurried/rash
to make a mess/to mess with/to be wild/to sleep around/to jump into bed
daring/presumptuous/daredevil
variant of 惹是生非[re3 shi4 sheng1 fei1]
to talk drivel/to make irresponsible remarks
